item.title: how it started : how it ended State of the Map Europe 2023 edition @sotmeu #OpenStreetMap #OSM #sotmeu Collage of two photos. Upper half is a jigsaw not done with slogan "how it started" Bottom half is the jigsaw done (it's a map) with caption "how it ended" In the the middle is the icon for state of the Map Europe 2023 icon
The follow what's happening at State of the Map Europe this weekend, you can follow the official account @sotmeu or the hashtag #sotmeu! üòÑüòÑüòÑ #OpenStreetMap #OSM
What are you mapping now? #OpenStreetMap #OSM #WeLoveMaps #Maps

Microsoft Pledges $150k to support OpenStreetMap! read more: <https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/10/25/microsoft-pledges-150k-to-support-openstreetmap/> #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #maps #map #geo #microsoft

The OpenStreetMap Foundation is a global organisation for the main OpenStreetMap IP, but the OSMF can't do everything. Local Chapters are an important part of the OpenStreetMap project. Read more about how to become an OSMF Local Chapter: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/10/12/local-chapters-what-to-know-and-how-to-join/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM

And they're off! üèá! The #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board election in Dec. has 3 open seats, and 6 candidates. List of candidates: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board#List_of_board_candidates>

Only a few hours left to nominate yourself for election to the #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board! There's currently 4 candidates for 3 seats. Have a look at who's running, at what the board does, at what you do, and what #OSM needs, and what you can bring, and NOMINATE YOURSELF! üòÅ https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board

If you don't/can't run for the #OpenStreetMap Foundation board, why not reach out to your favourite OSMers and ask them to consider standing for election?üòç more info: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board> #OSM

Do you want to be on the #OpenStreetMap Foundation Board? There are 3 seats open, and you have until 21st Oct to nominate yourself! more info: <https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/osmf-talk/2023-October/008759.html> nominate yourself here: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2023/Election_to_Board#Submission_of_self-nominations> #OSM #OSMF #gischat

üåç Preparing for #SotMAfrica2023 in Cameroon? If you require a visa for Cameroonüá®üá≤, easily apply for an e-visa here: https://evisacam.cm/ords/dl_portal/r/public_portal/home ‚úàÔ∏è Safe travels! see more: <https://twitter.com/sotmafrica/status/1709848703484203063>

Do you like maps? Why am I asking, of course you do! Have you made your own map? Yay! Would you like to show it off at @sotmeu, the annual european #OpenStreetMap conference? You're in luck! Read more here: <https://stateofthemap.eu/call-for-maps> #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotM #SotMEU #maps #gischat

In the #OpenStreetMap data model, linear features are (mostly) represented by the `way` data type, which can have at most 2,000 `node`s. Can you find a way for OpenStreetMap to have more than 2,000 donations by going https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/ ü•∫ü•∫ #OSM
The #OpenStreetMap Donation drive is almost at 2,000 donations! üòç Can you find a way to make it over 2,000?ü•∫ü•∫ https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/
What #OpenStreetMap map style do you like? üó∫ü§î reply with nice examples of #OSM maps! üòä

There's a new map style on OpenStreetMap.org! The Tracestrack Topo map from @tracestrack. It's a mix of osm-carto and OpenTopoMap. It has many improvements: more tag support (busway, embankment, cuisine, solar plants, aquaculture, pitch, sea, tree etc.), CJK fonts, etc. There is also better internationalisation: country specific road shields, peaks using imperial system in the US, hierarchical place rendering in China, etc. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #maps A screenshot of OSM.org showing the map layer sector open and showing tracesstrack Topo map selected and that as a map shown
If you want to feel good about the #OpenStreetMap mapping world, go to https://Supporting.OpenStreetMap.org/donate and read the comments left by the people who have made a gift to #OSM.

Did you know that on 1st Aug 2023, which was a typical day for #OpenStreetMap, there were 2.8 BILLION requests served at a rate of about 32 thousand a second? You would if you read @pnormanss diary post! Thankfully, the OSM tile service is underwritten by https://www.fastly.com/ Read more... <https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/pnorman/diary/402291> #OSM #DataPorn
@Firefishy Mappers in the USA should now see their map changes more quickly.

#OSM's senior SRE, @Firefishy, tells us that the new server was required because we were running out of capacity in the US. It will be used for renderings/updating the default map style used on https://osm.org. Here are the hardware specs: <https://hardware.openstreetmap.org/servers/piasa.openstreetmap.org/>
